bmi.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This calculator provides an estimate based on height and weight. It does not account for muscle mass, bone density, or overall body composition. Please consult a healthcare provider for professional medical advice.

advice.underweight: Your BMI is below the healthy range. Consider consulting a healthcare provider about weight management strategies.
advice.normal: You are in a healthy weight range. Maintaining this weight is beneficial for cardiovascular health. Continue a balanced diet and regular activity.
advice.overweight: Your BMI is above the healthy range. Small lifestyle changes like increased activity can make a difference.
advice.obesity: Your BMI indicates obesity, which carries increased health risks. Please seek professional medical advice.
